section.title: Description
section.p: "An association between an Act and a Role with an Entity playing that Role. Each Entity (in a Role) involved in an Act in a certain way is linked to the act by one Participation-instance." - HL7 V3. This class speficially points to IndividualProvider to handle participations in which the participation is by a clinician and contains those HL7 attributes most commonly used.

stentry.p: "Contains any comments or notes made by the practitioner in reference to the action in which they participated." - HL7 V3.

"The modality by which the Entity playing the Role is participating in the Act. UsageNotes: For author (originator) participants, this is used to specify whether the information represented by the act was initially provided verbally, (hand-)written, or electronically. Examples: Physically present, over the telephone, written communication." - HL7 V3
"Whether the participant has attested participation through a signature, or whether such a signature is needed." - HL7 V3

"A textual or multimedia depiction of the signature by which the participant endorses and accepts responsibility for his or her participation in the Act as specified in the Participation.typeCode." - HL7 V3
"An interval of time specifying the time during which the participant is involved in the act through this Participation." - HL7 V3.

Represents information about a person who is authorized to provide health care services in the role of practitioner for a health care provider organization. The role of practitioner includes all functions performed for a health care provider organization in order to provide patient care and treatment.
